# Font Collection Browse our curated collection of open-licensed fonts, designed for web developers who value **user agency**, **inspectable code**, and **minimal dependencies**. ## Our Philosophy This font collection embodies principles of user empowerment: - **Fork-First Architecture**: Create your own font collection by forking this repository - **Minimal User Code**: Clean, readable CSS that you can understand and modify - **No Lock-In**: Use fonts in any project, host anywhere, with complete independence - **Educational Approach**: Every integration example teaches web font best practices ## Quick Start ### Via CDN (Fastest) ```css /* Clean, semantic CSS that teaches best practices */ @font-face { font-family: 'Aspekta'; src: url('https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/hund-press/font-families@v1.2.0/aspekta/fonts/webfonts/Aspekta-400.woff2') format('woff2'); font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-display: swap; /* Prevents invisible text during font load */ } .your-text { font-family: 'Aspekta', system-ui, sans-serif; /* Always provide fallbacks */ } ``` ### Via ES Module (Most Flexible) ```javascript // Import font data for programmatic use import { aspekta } from 'https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/hund-press/font-families@v1.2.0/dist/modules/aspekta.js' // Generate CSS dynamically with full font information console.log('Available weights:', Object.keys(aspekta.weights)) ``` ### Fork Your Own Collection (Full Independence) 1. [Fork this repository](https://github.com/hund-press/font-families/fork) 2. Add your own fonts to `fonts/open-fonts/` 3. Run `npm run build` to generate your catalog 4. Deploy your own font collection anywhere --- ## Available Fonts
